name: Stick Fight: The Game
summary: Stick Fight is a physics-based couch/online fighting game where you battle it out as the iconic stick figures from the golden age of the internet. Fight it out against your friends or find random sticks from around the world!
info:
• 中文名: 火柴人乱斗
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 动作
  • 游玩人数: 4
  • 发行日期: 2017-09-28
  • 开发: Landfall West
  • 发行: Landfall
